group_1.textLeft: This way! Let's go to the graves!

group_1.textCenter: I feel like we'll get cursed...@I wonder if this is okay...?

group_1.textRight: Dunno where, but I coulda sworn I'd heard of@Suitoku Temple before...

group_1.textCenter: Oi oi, I knew I saw someone over here.
Aren't you one of Mikazuki Villa's Magical Girls?

group_1.textRight: Crap, this was that Tokime place!

group_1.textLeft: What're you sneaking around for,@trying to spy on your enemy?

group_1.textRight: Hell no! We came here lookin' for spirits!

group_1.textLeft: While the sun's still out!?
Ah-haha, there ain't no spirits,@but we got some nitwits.

group_1.textRight: We're not dumb! 'Cause we heard all about it!
That a ghost was seen here at noon.
Besides, Ayame and I are not in the Union,
so we're especially not here to spy on any enemies...

group_1.textLeft: It'd be all the same if there was one,@havin' a ghost at this hour...
Well, either way, it'd be better if you came back@another day.
Didn't y'all hear about the Tokime?

group_1.textRight: ...That you guys beat the Neo-Magius,@but a ton of your friends got hurt?

group_1.textLeft: So you know.
Which means you should also know@we don't have time to be dealin' with visitors.

group_1.textRight: Charu!

group_1.textLeft: Heheh, I've been waiting to say that line@my whole life!

group_1.textRight: What the heck was that...?

group_1.textLeft: Ryouko, it's okay to let these three through.

group_1.textRight: Hm?@So you're sayin' those two are doin' alright, then?

group_1.textLeft: Yep, they're in stable condition, so we're all good.

group_1.textRight: Well, guess we got no problems here, do we?
They can come in now if word's already@moved that quickly.

group_1.textLeft: That's what I meant!

group_1.textRight: ...Quickly?

group_1.textCenter: So Sunao and Chika,@they are already doing well, then?
From what I could tell by asking the dead residing@in the temple, they have escaped death.

group_1.textLeft: Thank the gods...@They're not going to the underworld after all...

group_1.textRight: As Diviners, we have no need to worry@about physical damage.
Though it does consume magic,@our recovery is certain.

group_1.textLeft: I know that,@but I still cannot help but worry for them.

group_1.textRight: I agree with that, howevãƒ¼
Hm?
Oh geez! There really ARE ghosts up in here!!

group_1.textLeft: See, see! What did I tell you!?
Quiet down a little...!
You'll wake up Sunao and Chika...!

group_1.textRight: I-I'm sorry...!
But I really didn't believe there were ghosts...

group_1.textLeft: I knew we'd get this reaction.

group_1.textRight: What is the matter?

group_1.textLeft: Honestly, I thought we had visitors,@but instead we got surprised screaming.

group_1.textRight: They said they'd come to the temple lookin' for@spirits.
I heard all about it!@There's ghosts appearing in Suichoku Temple!

group_1.textLeft: So that's how you got through.@The story has traveled quickly.
This is Asahi's unique magic.

group_1.textRight: ...Huh? Then you mean that chick's the one that's@makin' them appear!?

group_1.textLeft: That chick... Well, it is true.

group_1.textRight: What're you making ghosts come out for?

group_1.textLeft: It can be used in several ways,
but in this instance, it is validation concerning@the time of one's death.

group_1.textRight: You're making the ghosts...do math...?

group_1.textLeft: It is not about calculations;@I am talking about the time of death.
With Ms. Sunao and Ms. Chika's injuries, it is a@question of whether they are closer to life or death,
and that is my way of confirming.

group_1.textRight: WhaAATT!? Are they gonna be okay!?

group_1.textLeft: They're okay, that's why we let you three pass.
I heard they are already doing well,@so they must have had a swift recovery.

group_1.textRight: That's a huge relief then.
Hey, Ayame...
Now that you know there are ghosts,@what were you going to do...?

group_1.textLeft: Uh, well...
Ask 'em to talk to the ghosts of Felicia's parents...@I guess?

group_1.textRight: Um, even if they could...@To do it right in front of Felicia...

group_1.textLeft: That bad...?
But she's already heard, so why not just ask her?

group_1.textRight: Y-you can't...!
You might hurt Felicia,
so you absolutely cannot...!
